messages.subject: Damien's movie is on dropshots
messages.msgSnippet: I first want to thank whoever it was that posted their kids video links on dropshots.  Damien put his short film The Insulter on there in installments.
messages.messageBody:
I first want to thank whoever it was that posted their kids' video links on
dropshots. Damien put his short film "The Insulter" on there in
installments. Here's the link if you'd like to see it:
www.dropshots.com/yargen . It's in installments, so start at the bottom and
work your way up. We made this short film while on vacation recently and it
was a lot of fun. He's started work on another film with the working title
"The Easter Mystery" about the Easter bunny being upset that Christmas is
the big holiday of the year so he goes to drastic measures to ruin
Christmas. Enjoy!





Marjorie



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
